p:
In the context of climate change and rising demands by a growing human population, water is becoming an increasingly scarce resource
1 . Human societies in arid and semi-arid regions are particularly prone to water scarcity during at least some parts of the year
2 . In those regions, meeting the rising demands for freshwater and protecting or restoring ecosystems so that they can sustainably replenish water stocks will be one of the most difficult and important challenges of this century.
